name: Ext_R5_SubscriptionTopic_ca_modifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionTopic|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: missing | exact | contains | not | text | in | not-in | below | above | type | identifier | of-type | code-text | text-advanced | iterate
element.definition: Modifiers allowed for the filter parameter.
element.comment: `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` maps to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: missing | exact | contains | not | text | in | not-in | below | above | type | identifier | of-type | code-text | text-advanced | iterate
element.definition: Modifiers allowed for the filter parameter.
element.comment: `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` maps to R4B `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Search Modifier Codes supported in this filter.
